item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:58AM; 1622 S Stearns Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Dl0on7; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN: 41 firefighters extinguished the fire in 37 minutes with no injuries reported. The bulk of the fire was located in the attic, running the walls which had to be opened up to chase down all remaining fire and smoldering spots. The incident commander requested LAFD Arson and LAPD respond for a potential suspect. While a knockdown was called, firefighters will continue working an area around the chimney (which had heavy fire) to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC9 E226 E261 E292 E58 E61 E68 EM18 RA58 RA858 RA92 T26 T61 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:21AM; 1622 S Stearns Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Dl0on7; Mid-City; Two story duplex with heavy smoke showing from the attic vents. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and report the first floor is clear. One additional task force requested.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E292 E58 E68 RA58 T61 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0160; 04:25AM; 231 N Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xmvvuM; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 34 firefighters extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the attic on both units of the duplex. This is a vacant structure and there was a partial roof collapse. The primary and secondary searches were clear with no occupants located. No further details. ; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 RA20 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0160; 03:58AM; 231 N Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xmvvuM; Westlake; One story duplex with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 RA20 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Confined Space Rescue; INC#0033; 12:38AM; 5927 W Imperial Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bdr7PK; Westchester; One approximately 30yo male patient transported after being pulled unconscious from an aircraft fuel tank after performing maintenance (commercial cargo plane). Patient is in unknown condition. Five additional patients are being evaluated and are not expected to require hospital transport. No further details.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC13 BC4 BC9 E205 E27 E288 E295 E51 E88 E95 EM9 HR3 RA51 RA64 RA862 RA867 RA95 T5 T88 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Train vs Ped - FATALITY; INC#0260; 06:24AM; 7927 N Orion Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LbD39k; Van Nuys; One person, estimated in their 40s (gender unknown) struck by (Eastbound) Metrolink train is determined dead on scene. The track is shut down for the duration of the law enforcement investigation. All media inquiries are referred to LAPD Inc# 0668 Van Nuys Division, LA County Sheriff (unknown incident number) and Los Angeles County Coroner. No injuries reported from train (unknown number of occupants) The original 9-1-1 call was received at 5:48AM. No further details.; FS 90; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E290 E39 E81 E90 EM15 HR3 RA39 RA81 T39 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire 09/11/2022 INC#0156

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0156; 04:02AM; 4802 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d6b5PM; #SouthPark; After 1 hour and 40 minutes, the Incident Commander has declared a "knockdown" of the fire. Crews will remain on scene and continue to flow water, ensuring hot spots and smoldering debris within the collapsed building are eliminated. LAFD Heavy Equipment will be assisting with the overhaul. A total of two firefighters were injured. One in moderate condition was transported to the hospital, and the other in fair condition will seek follow-up care after the incident concludes. The cause of the fire remains under active investigation. ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 AR11 AR17 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E202 E203 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E26 E266 E295 E3 E33 E46 E5 E94 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 EM13 HE1 HR3 PH1 PI2 RA14 RA15 RA20 RA21 RA246 RA33 RA46 RA810 RM2 SQ21 T10 T15 T2 T21 T3 T33 T66 T9 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 09/11/2022 INC#0156

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0156; 03:35AM; 4802 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d6b5PM; #SouthPark; Over 100 firefighters continue battling the flames in defensive operations with heavy streams, as several parts of the burning church have now collapsed.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 AR11 AR17 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E203 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E26 E266 E3 E46 E5 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 PI2 RA14 RA15 RA20 RA21 RA246 RA33 RA46 RM2 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0156; 02:22AM; 4802 S Mckinley Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d6b5PM; #SouthPark; Two-story church, fully involved with fire. After firefighters made entry to fight the fire, an interior collapse caused several members to be trapped. A mayday was put out on the fire ground and rescue operations ensued. One member is being transported in unknown condition, while the rest remain on scene to continue working the incident. MEDIA: PIO/Firefighter David Ortiz en route.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR17 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E17 E203 E21 E215 E221 E233 E46 E5 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA15 RA21 RA246 RA33 RA46 SQ21 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1187; 03:44PM; Radio Hill; MAP: https://bit.ly/radiohill; #ElysianPark; 40 LAFD Firefighters, responding by ground and air, took just 49 minutes to contain flames to less than one (1) acre of light grass and brush north of the radio towers. No injury. No structures. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC2 E1 E202 E203 E212 E250 E290 E4 E44 E47 E90 EM2 H1 H3 H6 HA1 HA3 HA6 RA47 RA90 T12 T2 T3 T90; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey
